title: Remote Financial Planning Admin Assistant (Australia)
job_overview:
Remote Financial Planning Virtual Assistant (Cebu applicants are preferred)

Are you an experienced financial planning administrator with at least two (2) years of Australian financial planning administration experience? We are looking for a highly organized Remote Financial Planning Virtual Assistant to support our growing team.

About the Role
In this position, you will work closely with an Australian Financial Adviser, providing administrative and financial planning support. The ideal candidate will be proactive, methodical, accurate, and able to work independently with minimal supervision, ensuring that financial documentation and client records are handled with precision.

Key Responsibilities
• Assist with financial planning administration and ongoing fee agreements.
• Manage sensitive client information professionally.
• Ensure accuracy in client data, including financial planning documentation.
• Work with financial platforms such as MyNorth, Hub24, Praemium, Zurich, OnePath, AIA, TAL, and MLC.
• Maintain knowledge of financial planning regulations, superannuation, and insurance laws in Australia.
• Adjust work hours when required to align with team needs.

Qualifications & Skills Required

- Exclusively open to Philippine-based applicants, with preference for candidates from Cebu.
- Minimum 2 years of experience in Australian financial planning administration. 
- Proactive, self-starting mindset—ability to anticipate needs and take initiative. 
- Strong experience in financial planning administration; paraplanning knowledge is preferred but not required. 
- Competency in implementation tasks, including rollovers, sending Third Party Authorities, insurance quotes and investment switches. 
- Meticulous attention to detail and accuracy—ensuring precision in financial documentation. 
- Familiarity with financial platforms and providers, including MyNorth, Hub24, Praemium, Zurich, OnePath, AIA, TAL, and MLC. 
- Ability to balance speed with precision, delivering high-quality work efficiently.

Work Schedule

- Mondays: 8:00 AM to 4:00 PM (PHT) 
- Tuesdays to Thursdays: 7:30 AM to 4:00 PM (PHT) 
- Fridays: 7:30 to 2:00 PM (PHT) 
- Flexibility required for workload adjustments

How to Apply
Send your resume to Upgrade to see actual info and make sure to indicate in your email the role you are applying for.
